content: And so we tried to handhold people throughout this period of time, our sales staff did a tremendous job stepping up in communicating with the customers and alongside the operational team letting them know where we stood, we are getting the products back out there today, feel like that we have the opportunity to pass on that third price increase because of what's happening in the commodity side of things and they are aware of that, but yeah, we do have to live up to great service and that's what we believe the full conversion did, JD Edwards will do for us.
